alert.note: Alert for Columbus; Inland Brunswick (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 2:27PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorm moving into Columbus and northeastern Horry Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 228 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms over southern Columbus county, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Whiteville, Tabor City, Loris, Chadbourn, Bethel, Lake Waccamaw, Makatoka, Freeland, Hallsboro, Nakina, Redbug, Exum, Bughill, Southeastern Community College, Williams, Ash, Old Dock, Mollie, Sidney and Clarendon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
